metadata.title: NOTE One-step triplex PCR/RT-PCR to detect canine distemper virus, canine parvovirus and canine kobuvirus

abstract.original_text: To rapidly distinguish Canine distemper virus (CDV), canine parvovirus (CPV), and canine kobuvirus (CaKoV) in practice, a one-step multiplex PCR/RT-PCR assay was developed, with detection limits of 10 2.1 TCID 50 for CDV, 10 1.9 TCID 50 for CPV and 10 3 copies for CaKoV. This method did not amplify nonspecific DNA or RNA from other canine viruses. Therefore, the assay provides a sensitive tool for the rapid clinical detection and epidemiological surveillance of CDV, CPV and CaKoV in dogs.

This method did not amplify nonspecific DNA or RNA from other canine viruses .
Therefore , the assay provides a sensitive tool for the rapid clinical detection and epidemiological surveillance of CDV ,
